Summary: Odd shape changing direction changing fireball
trends: There has been one other sighting in Slippery Rock
There were no other sightings in Slippery Rock on or around June 23rd 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsSitting at campfire at camp. Supermoon event had us looking at the sky more than normal this weekend. First thought it was a Big fireball shooting star. Bowie shaped fireball in east sky traveling very slowly northbound. Changed shape to circular and changed direction traveling east away from us and disappeared in the distance. Felt bewildered, not knowing what to think.
